The 'Washington Wizards' are a professional basketball franchise based in
Washington, D.C. They are part of the Southeast Division of the Eastern
Conference in the National Basketball Association. The team plays their home
games at the Verizon Center, in the Chinatown neighborhood of Washington, D.C.
